item.title: Litecoin Update: Multiple payment processors, growing lightning network nodes, Litecoin Core 0.15.1rc1
item.description: This week marks a very positive week as multiple payment processors have announced support for Litecoin. There is much interest in the LitePay payment platform similar to BitPay but without the 5% fees. LitePay is expected to launch on February 26th, 2018. Aliant Payments the most recent to add Litecoin to their payment processor is a large credit card processing & merchant services provider - it is one of the first to cryptocurrency solutions (BTC, LTC, ETH) for merchants.
